meanings.definition: A monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a dollar.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny cent on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She paid for the candy with a cent.
meanings.sent3: The cent rolled away, playing hard to catch.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was worth more than a cent.
meanings.sent5: The cent gleamed in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.definition: A hundredth part of the monetary units of various other nations, including the euro.
meanings.sent1: The vending machine only accepted cents.
meanings.sent2: He exchanged his cents for euros at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The cents jingled in his pocket as he walked.
meanings.sent4: Her savings grew bit by bit, cent by cent.
meanings.sent5: The cents piled up, a small fortune in total.
